author: Flame442
install_msg: Thanks for installing hider. Commands are all under the group command `[p]hider`.
name: Hider
short: Hide commands from users in help.
description: Hide commands from users in help. Running [p]hider hide allows a particular command to be hidden from the output of [p]help. This does not prevent the command from being run, use [p]command disable for that instead. If [p]helpset showhidden is enabled, this cog will be unable to hide commands.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store user data.
